member.name: T:Nito.KitchenSink.WeakCollection`1
member.summary: A collection of weak references to objects. Weak references are purged by iteration/count operations, not by add/remove operations.
member.typeparam: The type of object to hold weak references to.

remarks.para: Since the collection holds weak references to the actual objects, the collection is comprised of both living and dead references. Living references refer to objects that have not been garbage collected, and may be used as normal references. Dead references refer to objects that have been garbage collected.
Dead references do consume resources; each dead reference is a garbage collection handle.
Dead references may be cleaned up by a operation. Some properties and methods cause a purge as a side effect; the member documentation specifies whether a purge takes place.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.WeakCollection`1.list
member.summary: The actual collection of strongly-typed weak references.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that is empty.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.WeakCollection`1.Add(`0)
member.summary: Adds a weak reference to an object to the collection. Does not cause a purge.
member.param: The object to add a weak reference to.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.WeakCollection`1.Remove(`0)
member.summary: Removes a weak reference to an object from the collection. Does not cause a purge.
member.param: The object to remove a weak reference to.
member.returns: True if the object was found and removed; false if the object was not found.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.WeakCollection`1.Purge
member.summary: Removes all dead objects from the collection.

member.summary: Frees all resources held by the collection.

member.summary: Empties the collection.

member.summary: Closes the output stream so it no longer receives tracing or debugging output.

member.summary: Releases the resources owned by this object.

member.summary: Trims the archived log files if there are too many, and changes the current log file into an archived log file. The current log file must be closed before invoking this method.

member.name: T:Nito.KitchenSink.SafeGCHandle
member.summary: Helper class to help with managing resources.

remarks.para: The only reason this isn't public is to prevent misuse by end users.

Note that this class can only be used to represent objects that should be freed when garbage collected (or disposed). This class cannot be used in several interop situations, such as passing ownership of an object to a callback function.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.SafeGCHandle.#ctor(System.Object,System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandleType)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class referring to the target in the given way.
member.param: The object to reference.
The way to reference the object.

member.summary: Frees the garbage collection handle.
member.returns: Whether the handle was released successfully.

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.SafeGCHandle.Handle
member.summary: Gets the underlying allocated garbage collection handle.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the handle value is invalid.

member.summary: Represents a weak reference, which references an object while still allowing that object to be reclaimed by garbage collection.

member.name: T:Nito.KitchenSink.CircularBuffer`1
member.summary: A circular buffer, which provides O(1) indexed access, O(1) insertions to the back, O(1) removals from the front, and O(N) resizing. Inserting items is not supported.
member.typeparam: The type of elements contained in the deque.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.CircularBuffer`1.buffer
member.summary: The actual buffer that holds the view. When setting this, should be set to null.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.CircularBuffer`1.offset
member.summary: The offset into where the view begins. When setting this, should be set to null.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.CircularBuffer`1.count
member.summary: The number of valid elements in the view.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.CircularBuffer`1.view
member.summary: The view, cached in a member variable. This may be null, and should be accessed via the method.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CircularBuffer`1.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified capacity.
member.param: The initial capacity.
member.exception: Capacity may not be less than or equal to zero.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CircularBuffer`1.Add(`0)
member.summary: Adds a single element at the back of this circular buffer. If necessary, an element will be removed from the front of the buffer to make room.
member.param: The element to add.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CircularBuffer`1.AddRange(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{`0})
member.summary: Adds a collection of elements at the back of this circular buffer. If necessary, element(s) will be be removed from the front of the buffer to make room.
member.param: The collection of elements to add.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CircularBuffer`1.Remove
member.summary: Removes and returns the first element of this circular buffer.
member.returns: The former first element.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CircularBuffer`1.RemoveRange(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes a range of elements from the front of this circular buffer.
member.param: The number of elements to remove.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CircularBuffer`1.Clear
member.summary: Removes all items from this deque.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CircularBuffer`1.DoGetItem(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets an element at the specified view index.
member.param: The zero-based view index of the element to get. This index is guaranteed to be valid.
member.returns: The element at the specified index.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CircularBuffer`1.DoSetItem(System.Int32,`0)
member.summary: Sets an element at the specified view index.
member.param: The zero-based view index of the element to get. This index is guaranteed to be valid.
The element to store in the list.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CircularBuffer`1.DoInsert(System.Int32,`0)

member.name: T:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.MultipleByteMultipleDelimiterFramer
member.summary: Provides message framing for multiple-byte-delimiter-based protocols that support multiple delimiters. Does not perform any unescaping of the message data.

remarks.para: No begin delimiter may start with another begin delimiter.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.MultipleByteMultipleDelimiterFramer.maxMessageSize
member.summary: The maximum size of messages allowed, or 0 if there is no maximum.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.MultipleByteMultipleDelimiterFramer.beginDelimiters
member.summary: The beginning delimiters.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.MultipleByteMultipleDelimiterFramer.endDelimiters
member.summary: The ending delimiters.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.MultipleByteMultipleDelimiterFramer.trace
member.summary: The trace source used for all communications messages.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.MultipleByteMultipleDelimiterFramer.dataBuffer
member.summary: The data buffer, which grows dynamically as more data arrives. This is never null. This buffer contains the begin delimiter but not the end delimiter.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.MultipleByteMultipleDelimiterFramer.delimiterIndex
member.summary: The index of the matching begin delimiter at the front of the data buffer, and also the index of the end delimiter that must match. This is -1 if there are no matching begin delimiters yet.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.MultipleByteMultipleDelimiterFramer.endDelimiterIndex
member.summary: How much of the end delimiter has been seen (implicitly at the end of the data buffer).

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.MultipleByteMultipleDelimiterFramer.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Byte[]},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Byte[]})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Maximum size of messages, or 0 if message size is not restricted.
The begin delimiters.
The end delimiters.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.MultipleByteMultipleDelimiterFramer.Reset
member.summary: Re-initializes the framer instance to a clean state. After this method returns, the framer instance is identical to a newly-constructed instance.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.MultipleByteMultipleDelimiterFramer.DataReceived(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Byte})
member.summary: Notifies the framer instance that incoming data has been received from the stream. This method will invoke as necessary.

remarks.para: This method may invoke zero or more times.
Zero-length receives are ignored. May streams use a 0-length read to indicate the end of a stream, but the framer takes no action in this case.

member.param: The data received from the stream. Cannot be null. May be a slice of the read buffer for the stream.
member.exception: If the data received is not a properly-formed message.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.MultipleByteMultipleDelimiterFramer.AppendDataToDataBuffer(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Byte})
member.summary: Resizes the data buffer and appends the new range of data to it.
member.param: The buffer containing the new data to be appended.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.MultipleByteMultipleDelimiterFramer.CheckMaxMessageSize(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks for messages that exceed the maximum message size in an overflow-safe way.
member.param: The current size of the message so far.
The additional bytes that have arrived as part of this message.

member.name: E:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.MultipleByteMultipleDelimiterFramer.MessageArrived
member.summary: Occurs when a message has arrived. Exceptions thrown from this method propogate through , and may leave the framer instance in an invalid state.

member.name: T:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.MultipleByteMultipleDelimiterFramer.MessageArrivedEventHandler
member.summary: Receives notification that a message has arrived.
member.param: The index of the matching begin/end delimiters for this message.
The message that has arrived. This may contain an alias of the data passed to in this call stack, but will not contain an alias to any data previously passed to .

member.summary: Gets what remains of the 128-bit MD5 or SHA-1 hash of the name used to create this GUID. This is only valid if returns or . Note that bits 60-63 and bits 70-71 will always be zero (their original values are permanently lost).
member.param: The GUID from which to extract the hash value.
member.returns: The hash value from the GUID.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.GuidExtensions.GetRandom(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets the 122-bit random value used to create this GUID. This is only valid if returns . The most-significant 6 bits of the first octet in the returned array are always 0.
member.param: The GUID from which to extract the random value.
member.returns: The random value of the GUID.

member.summary: Attempts to get the length of the stream. Returns -1 if the length of the stream could not be determined.
member.param: The stream to query.
member.returns: The length of the stream, or -1 if the stream has an undefined length.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.StreamExtensions.CopyTo(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream,System.Byte[],System.Action{System.Int64})
member.summary: Synchronously copies the contents of this stream into another stream.
member.param: The stream that is the source of the copy.
The stream that is the destination of the copy.
The buffer used by the copy. The size of this buffer determines the sizes of reads and writes made to the streams.
A callback method invoked with the number of bytes transferred so far. May be null.

member.name: T:Nito.KitchenSink.PropertyChangedEventHandlerExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for delegates.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.PropertyChangedEventHandlerExtensions.Raise``2(System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventHandler,``0,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,``1}})
member.summary: Raises the delegate for the property identified by a lambda expression.
member.typeparam: The type of object containing the property.
member.param: The delegate to raise. If this parameter is null, then no action is taken.
The object raising this event.
The lambda expression identifying the property that changed.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.PropertyChangedEventHandlerExtensions.RaiseItems(System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventHandler,System.Object)
member.summary: Raises the delegate for the items property (with the name "Items[]").
member.param: The delegate to raise. If this parameter is null, then no action is taken.
The object raising this event.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.PropertyChangedEventHandlerExtensions.Raise(System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventHandler,System.Object)
member.summary: Raises the delegate for all properties.
member.param: The delegate to raise. If this parameter is null, then no action is taken.
The object raising this event.

member.name: T:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.SingleByteDelimiterFramer
member.summary: Provides message framing for single-byte-delimiter-based protocols. Does not perform any unescaping of the message data.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.SingleByteDelimiterFramer.maxMessageSize
member.summary: The maximum size of messages allowed, or 0 if there is no maximum.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.SingleByteDelimiterFramer.beginDelimiter
member.summary: The beginning delimiter.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.SingleByteDelimiterFramer.endDelimiter
member.summary: The ending delimiter.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.SingleByteDelimiterFramer.trace
member.summary: The trace source used for all communications messages.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.SingleByteDelimiterFramer.dataBuffer
member.summary: The data buffer, which grows dynamically as more data arrives. This is never null.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.SingleByteDelimiterFramer.sawBeginDelimiter
member.summary: Whether the begin delimiter has been seen.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.SingleByteDelimiterFramer.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Maximum size of messages, or 0 if message size is not restricted.
The begin delimiter.
The end delimiter.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.SingleByteDelimiterFramer.Reset
member.summary: Re-initializes the framer instance to a clean state. After this method returns, the framer instance is identical to a newly-constructed instance.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.SingleByteDelimiterFramer.DataReceived(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Byte})
member.summary: Notifies the framer instance that incoming data has been received from the stream. This method will invoke as necessary.

remarks.para: This method may invoke zero or more times.
Zero-length receives are ignored. May streams use a 0-length read to indicate the end of a stream, but the framer takes no action in this case.

member.param: The data received from the stream. Cannot be null. May be a slice of the read buffer for the stream.
member.exception: If the data received is not a properly-formed message.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.SingleByteDelimiterFramer.AppendDataToDataBuffer(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Byte})
member.summary: Resizes the data buffer and appends the new range of data to it.
member.param: The buffer containing the new data to be appended.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.SingleByteDelimiterFramer.CheckMaxMessageSize(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks for messages that exceed the maximum message size in an overflow-safe way.
member.param: The current size of the message so far.
The additional bytes that have arrived as part of this message.

member.name: E:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.SingleByteDelimiterFramer.MessageArrived
member.summary: Occurs when a message has arrived. Exceptions thrown from this method propogate through , and may leave the framer instance in an invalid state.

member.name: T:Nito.KitchenSink.StringExtensions
member.summary: Provides useful extension methods for string operations.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.StringExtensions.csharpEscapeSequences
member.summary: The standard escape sequences defined by the C# language.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.StringExtensions.prettyEscapeSequences
member.summary: The escape sequences used by "pretty printing".

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.StringExtensions.PrintableEscape(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a flattened, printable C#-escaped equivalent of the input string.
member.param: The source string.
member.returns: A backslash-escaped copy of the source string.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.StringExtensions.Printable(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the string itself if it is printable and flattened, otherwise a copy of the string.
member.param: The source string.
member.returns: The source string or a backslash-escaped copy of the source string.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.StringExtensions.PrettyDump(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Byte})
member.summary: Returns a printable string of the byte sequence, interpreting it as ASCII if possible. If the sequence is interpreted as a string, the flattened, escaped string is returned enclosed in double-quotes; otherwise, each byte of the sequence is converted to hex, separated by spaces, and enclosed in square brackets.
member.param: The data to dump.
member.returns: A printable string.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.StringExtensions.Flatten(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces any '\r' or '\n' characters in the string with spaces.
member.param: The source string.
member.returns: The flattened string.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.StringExtensions.TextElements(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all text elements (Unicode glyphs) for a given string.
member.param: The source string.
member.returns: All the text elements in the source string.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.StringExtensions.Join(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Concatenates a separator between each element of a string enumeration.
member.param: The string enumeration.
The separator string. This may not be null.
member.returns: The concatenated string.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.StringExtensions.Join(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Concatenates a sequence of strings.
member.param: The sequence of strings.
member.returns: The concatenated string.

member.name: T:Nito.KitchenSink.Communication.MessageArrivedEventHandler
member.summary: Receives notification that a message has arrived.
member.param: The message that has arrived. This may contain an alias of the data passed to in this call stack, but will not contain an alias to any data previously passed to .
